product_name: Dynafit TLT Radical ST Randonee Bindings with 92mm Brakes - 2013/2014
long_description: Light, strong and simple to use, Dynafit TLT Radical ST randonee bindings with 92mm brakes will get you deep into the backcountry where fresh tracks are yours for the taking.
short_description: Light, strong and simple to use, Dynafit TLT Radical ST randonee bindings with 92mm brakes will get you deep into the backcountry where fresh tracks are yours for the taking.
